languages.text: "Ему была поручена некая миссия от Арбитес, и, насколько я знаю, она была провалена, в связи с чем господин Антар был сочтен недостойным своего ранга и служения вам".
"The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
languages.original_text: "Ему была поручена некая миссия от Арбитес, и, насколько я знаю, она была провалена, в связи с чем господин Антар был сочтен недостойным своего ранга и служения вам".

traits.locale_text: "The Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort, which as far as I know ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
"The Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort, which as far as I know ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
"The Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
"The Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
"The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
"The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

languages.text: 「高等裁定局は彼に何らかの任務を与えたようですが、私の知る限りではそれは失敗に終わりました。その結果、マスター・アンサールはその地位に値せず、あなたに仕えるには不適格と判断されたのです」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局は彼に何らかの任務を与えたようですが、私の知る限りではそれは失敗に終わりました。その結果、マスター・アンサールはその地位に値せず、あなたに仕えるには不適格と判断されたのです」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites onu bildiğim kadarıyla başarısızlıkla sonuçlanan bir vazifeyle görevlendirdi. Bu da Üstat Anthar'ın mevkisine layık olmadığına ve size hizmet etmeye uygun olmadığına karar verilmesine yol açtı."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites onu bildiğim kadarıyla başarısızlıkla sonuçlanan bir vazifeyle görevlendirdi. Bu da Üstat Anthar'ın mevkisine layık olmadığına ve size hizmet etmeye uygun olmadığına karar verilmesine yol açtı."

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites le encomendó una misión y, por lo que tengo entendido, terminó en fracaso, lo que hizo que se considerara al maestro Anthar indigno del cargo y de servirle».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites le encomendó una misión y, por lo que tengo entendido, terminó en fracaso, lo que hizo que se considerara al maestro Anthar indigno del cargo y de servirle».

languages.text: “据我所知，法务部派遣安萨大师执行某项行动，但那场行动以失败告终。法务部认为安萨大师不配继续担任监察官一职，也不配继续为您服务。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: “据我所知，法务部派遣安萨大师执行某项行动，但那场行动以失败告终。法务部认为安萨大师不配继续担任监察官一职，也不配继续为您服务。”

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites lui a confié une mission quelconque et, pour autant que je sache, elle s'est soldée par un échec. Résultat, maître Anthar a été jugé indigne de son grade et inapte à vous servir. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites lui a confié une mission quelconque et, pour autant que je sache, elle s'est soldée par un échec. Résultat, maître Anthar a été jugé indigne de son grade et inapte à vous servir. »

languages.text: "Das Adeptus Arbites hatte ihn mit einer Mission betraut, die meines Wissens fehlschlug, woraufhin Meister Anthar seines Ranges und des Dienstes für Eure Wenigkeit für unwürdig befunden wurde."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites tasked him with a mission of some sort that, as far as I know, ended in failure, leading to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Das Adeptus Arbites hatte ihn mit einer Mission betraut, die meines Wissens fehlschlug, woraufhin Meister Anthar seines Ranges und des Dienstes für Eure Wenigkeit für unwürdig befunden wurde."
